name: GamePigeon
description:
Have fun with your friends and family by playing a collection of excellent multiplayer games via iMessage!

GamePigeon features following games:
~ 8-Ball
~ Mini Golf
~ Basketball
~ Archery
~ Darts
~ Tanks
~ Sea Battle
~ Cup Pong
~ Anagrams
~ Mancala
~ Knockout
~ Shuffleboard
~ Chess
~ Checkers
~ Four in a Row
~ Gomoku
~ Reversi
~ 20 Questions
~ Dots and Boxes
~ 9-Ball
~ Word Hunt
~ Filler
~ Crazy 8!


More games are coming very soon!
